body_html: It does. The issue is that it is not possible to use the standard RNN model directly with the standard DataLoader. Shouldn't torch.utils.data.DataLoader allow batch transformations, or even just axes swapping (so that the batch dimension is the second).

body: It does. The issue is that it is not possible to use the standard RNN model directly with the standard DataLoader. Shouldn't torch.utils.data.DataLoader allow batch transformations, or even just axes swapping (so that the batch dimension is the second).
